body__info2: If you want to find clothes similar to Blackpink's outfits, send us the pictures!
body__info3: Pictures will be added to the LOOKBOOK after analyzed with AI.
body__info4: If you enter your email address, you will get a notification email.
info__agree: Entering your email address is optional.
info__agree__box: Agree to Fashion Scanner's storing and processing email address.
